record.title: MEASURES READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2436, S. 2440, AND S. 2441
record.narrative:
MEASURES READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2436, S. 2440, AND S. 2441 -- (Senate - December 10, 2007)

[Page: S15081]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand there are three bills at the desk, and I ask for their first reading en bloc.

record.chair: The clerk will read the titles of the bills for the first time en bloc.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2436) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the term of the Commissioner of Internal Revenue.
A bill (S. 2440) to amend the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act of 1978, to modernize and streamline the provisions of that Act, and for other purposes.
A bill (S. 2441) to amend the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act of 1978, to modernize and streamline the provisions of that Act, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now ask for a second reading en bloc and object to my own request en bloc.

record.chair: Objection having been heard, the bills will receive their second reading on the next legislative day.
